messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Be kind, give Chocolate Eggs!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Spacepizza Division

Cargo: It looks like a neighbouring station accidentally delivered their pizza to you instead

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Cargo shuttle commandeered by CentCom.

The cargo shuttle should return in five minutes. Have some supply points for your trouble.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Howd'y crew!  Th'is ichchch yyo'uur...huuuhhh...captaiin chpeahking. We're going ttoo' have...huuuhhh...a relaxxeeed shift...huuuhhh...toniiggght so koome on dow'n to thhe ba too get y'ouuurchchchelf ah 'hoot' slikee of   pizzzah!   ahahlchoo...huuuhhh......huuuhhh...ahll 'mem'bers are reminded tooo have chuit sensors' to maximuum and tto...huuuhhh...keeeep   tabs on 'proggressss, t'haaat is ahll!

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Don't forget: Today is pizza day so go on down to the bar for a hot slice! Also we're gonna have a relaxed shift tonight so yeah, get wasted. Also all memebers are reminded to have suit sensors maximum so we know your not dead in space all alone. Is all!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Ionospheric anomalies detected. Temporary telec#MCi46:5.;@63-BZZZZT

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Haha RD. Very funny.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We've recieved reports that an endangered species of mice has taken up residence in your maintinence. They must be caught and preserved, anyone caught harming will have their pay docked, or their job terminated.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: It's your evening announcement: Nanotrasen has decided to elect Mike Hunt as the new precident of the space comittte. Huh. And im going to pester them into giving us free alchohol because of our hard work. That is all.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Booze is not allowed, this is a christian company, but we're sending loads of fun.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Ignore centcom, just keep drinking. The lovely people will give us stuff though. Wonder what it could be?

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: I see you've found the condensed fun we sent over.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We may have a problem. CLOWN NUKES INCOMING. EVERYONE TO BRIDGE.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Fuck you centcom.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Kil lall clowns, stop the vines. Shits going down.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Please rate our fun and booze package from 1-10. We appreciate feedback.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I rated it a solid 10

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Bunny Office XXXIII's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: So, how's it going?

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Yeah. get to departures if you can

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Have you all had fun?
